page.title: 16INTERESTING PEOPLE 2
page.content:
MR.MALSOM Mr Malson told us in 1953 there was a party when the Queen was crowned. The party lasted 2\ hours and they had a good meal and lots of beer.Mr Malsom used to work at Townsend Farm he was a shepherd.In that farm there were 15 horses to plough the fields and 1 tractor.When Mr Malson came to live in the village with his sister at first, but then got married later.There also was a policeman who used to ride a bike around Brampton.Mr Malson told us more or less the same as Miss Keen.
{ By { Daniel Cooke { & { J.G.Cunningham
